1112.content: It was a sunny day at Beverlly Hills as Clover woke up with a soft yawn and streched in her bed. Sinse there weren't any missions, the three spies decided to take a break and just have a good life while they could. So while Sam and Alex were shopping Clover could just lay around the house and sleep. Slowly getting up the blond girl walked out of her room and heard the door bell ring "Huh?" Clover blinked as she opened the door to see that no one was there, except for a package standing infront of her. Blinking, Clover brought the box insied "Stranger, I don't remember ordering anything", she then opened the box and insied found a wierd looking device that seemed a mix between an Ipod and a remote control, on the side of the device Clover saw a label saying "MP3", the girl then grinned "Wow...Strange new MP3, maybe it's a free gift from someone" After that she pressed a green button witch she assumed was the start button. As she did that, the device turned around emiting a strange glow witch then scanned Clover from head to toes, and then turned off "The hell was that?" Clover looked at the device, she was abiut to press the button again, when she felt her stomach hurt alot. Placing her hand she felt her stomach bulge abit, after that she froze and gently moved her hands to make sure she wasn't mistaken. Her stomach did indeed bulge and it was slowly....Growing! Screaming her head off Clover dropped the device and looked down to see her once flat belly slowly growing and expanding, lifting up her nightgown and makeing the girl arch her back. Grunting and panting Clover rubbed her growing belly and then gasped when she felt a kick "N-No...No way! I....I'm pregnant?! But...But how?!" Just then it hit her, looking at the device she growled and with all her power kicked it across the corridor. Meanwhile her belly kept growing till it reached the size of her having twins, panting Cloverb rubbed her bare streched skin and she looked in the mirror "This...This can't be happening! I can't be pregnant now! I didn't even have a boyfriend!" Just then she heard a knock on the door "Hold on! Just a minute!" Clover answered as she waddled towards her room, and then returned in a bathrobe witch barely covered her expanded belly, after that she looked to see who it was.

Getting up from the table, Alex meeped as she nearly fell back and quickly had to arch her back to accommodate for newly added weight.Blushing deep red, she gently patted her belly as she saw that Britney was waiting for an explanation.

"Umm..W-Well..umm...I..I'm kinda..p-perm..p..preg with..-Sam and Clover..." She explained, stammering as she knew how just insane that whole thing sounded.

Then again, when ever did these girls have a normal day happen. Britney slowly nodded her head, as she placed her ear to Alex's belly, as the black girl blushed feeling a strange amount of delight in Britney so close to her belly, and actually being this huge and swollen. It was hard to explain, but it felt simply perfect to the black spy.

"S-So, what are we gonna do?" Britney asked, while her hands gently caressed Alex's belly.

It was another warm day in LA and Sam of the Beverly Hill's Totally Spies was in her apartment, lounging on the couch and watching some daytime drama while she snacked on potato chips.

The brainy spy's slothful actions weren't voluntary however, but a part of a special mission.

Jerry had informed her, Alex, and Clover that some strange white vans had been going all over the nation, kidnapping larger women.

The spies' mission was to figure out who they were and what they were up to. So far, whenever they tried to tail a one of the vans, they literally disapeared somehow.

Apparently, the only way they could catch them would be if one of them became a bigger woman. They drew straws to find out who would fatten up, and Sam drew the longest straw.

So after two months of intensive snacking, gorging, and forced naps, Sam had grown to a whopping 194 lbs.

She had a spare tire gut and chubby cheeks. Her breasts and but had grown, but only in proportion to the rest of her body, making her look like a big, pudgier version of herself.

Finally, while she reached a meaty hand into the nearly empty bag of chips, her doorbell rang.

Getting ready in case it was the kidnappers, Sam waddled to the door, when she opened it was...

Mandy grumbeled, as she paced back and forth around her room. She was waiting for almost four weeks, for her new gadget to arrive, which was a new phone model, which would make her popular once again. But so far, it didn't come.

"Ugh, I swear I'll sue the postal service one of these days..." She growled to herself, just when she heard the doorbell ring. Quickly rushing towards it, she opened the door an saw a package waiting for her. Letting out a squeel, Mandy quickly tore it open and pulled out what seemed your average smartphone. Grinning to herself, the spoiled girl quickly turned it on and then blinked a the weird setting it had. Scratching her head, she then pushed a random button when suddenly what she considered the front camera, fired a lazer beam right into her middle.

Meeping, Mandy dropped the device as she looked down "What kind of phone does that?!"" She exclaimed, and then gasped and froze as she suddenly saw her stomach starting to balloon and push out slowly.

"I'm getting fat?!" She yelled, as she tried to push it back in, but gasped at it felt much more firmer. When her stomach stopped at the size of triplets, with Many having to arch her back, she picked up the phone an saw what it said "Preggo transformation complete." 15123.content:
Britney gave a soft yawn as she rolled on her bed, looking pretty damn bored out of her mind. Lately, there haven't been many missions for her, so the blue spy girl didn't find much to do with her free time. That is until her laptop beeped showing she had an incoming message.

Blinking, she hurried to it and saw it was from Clover <Well, least my friends haven't forgotten me.> She though with a soft smile, as she turned on the webcam and froze. Before her, she did see Clover, but the blond also sported a massive girth as she was chowing down on a bucket of ice-cream which also seemed to have had pickles in it.

"Mmmm..Hey there Britney! Long time no see girl~" Clover exclaimed, as she licked her lips and then patted her belly gently, while Britney finally snapped out of her frozen shock.

"C-Clover?! W...What happened to you?! D-Did you get addicted to passion patties again?!" Britney asked, as Clover giggled shaking her head

"No silly! Haven't you heard, it's a new fad! Being huge and pregged up to the brim!" She declared, as Britney's eyes went to the size of dinner plates, as Clovers belly gave some powerfull kicks.

"H-How long...." SHe wanted to ask, but Clover quickly cut her off

"15th Months, and going girl~" She said rather proud of herself, as Britney's jaw dropped hard.

"FIFTEEN!?" She yelled, which got her a nod from Clover

"You should really try it. It feels amazing being this huge and growing. Here, let me send you the adress for this place, trust me you'll love it~" The blond spy said with a cute wink, as she tapped a few key's and then the adress popped up beside her webcam image.
